name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: [MUSIC]

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: This lecture is about a specific technique for

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Contextual Text Mining called Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _In this lecture
column6: we're going to continue discussing Contextual Text Mining. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And we're going to introduce Contextual Probablitistic Latent Semantic Analysis

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: as exchanging of POS for doing contextual text mining.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Recall that in contextual text mining we hope to analyze topics in text

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: in consideration of the context so

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: that we can associate the topics with a property of the context were interesting.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _So in this approach
column6: contextual probabilistic latent semantic analysis

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _or CPLSA
column6: the main idea is to express to the add interesting _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: context variables into a generating model.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Recall that before when we generate the text we generally assume we'll start

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _wIth some topics
column6: and then assemble words from some topics. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _But here
column6: we're going to add context variables
column7: so that the coverage of topics

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: and also the content of topics would be tied in context.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Or in other words
column6: we're going to let the context Influence both coverage and _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: the content of a topic.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: The consequences that this will enable us to discover contextualized topics.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Make the topics more interesting
column6: more meaningful. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Because we can then have topics that can be interpreted as

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: specifically to a particular context that we are interested in.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _For example
column6: a particular time period. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _As an extension of PLSA model

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: CPLSA does the following changes.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Firstly it would model the conditional likelihood of text given context.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _That clearly suggests that the generation of text would then depend on context

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: and that allows us to bring context into the generative model.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Secondly
column6: it makes two specific assumptions about the dependency _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: of topics on context.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _One is to assume that depending on the context
column6: depending on different time _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _periods or different locations
column6: we assume that there are different views of a topic _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: or different versions of word descriptions that characterize a topic.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And this assumption allows us to discover different

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: variations of the same topic in different contexts.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: The other is that we assume the topic coverage also depends on the context.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: That means depending on the time or

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _location
column6: we might cover topics differently. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Again
column6: this dependency would then allow us to _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: capture the association of topics with specific contexts.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: We can still use the EM algorithm to solve the problem of parameter estimation.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _And in this case
column6: the estimated parameters would naturally contain context variables. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _And in particular

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: a lot of conditional probabilities of topics given certain context.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And this is what allows you to do contextual text mining.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So this is the basic idea.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Now
column6: we don't have time to introduce this model in detail

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: but there are references here that you can look into to know more detail.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Here I just want to explain the high level ideas in more detail.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Particularly I want to explain the generation process.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Of text data that has context associated in such a model.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _So as you see here
column6: we can assume there are still multiple topics. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _For example
column6: some topics might represent a themes like a government response

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: donation Or the city of New Orleans.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Now this example is in the context of Hurricane Katrina and

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: that hit New Orleans.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Now as you can see we assume there are different

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: views associated with each of the topics.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _And these are shown as View 1
column6: View 2

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Each view is a different version of word distributions.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And these views are tied to some context variables.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _For example
column6: tied to the location Texas

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: or the occupation of the author being a sociologist.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Now
column6: on the right side
column7: now we assume the document has context information. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So the time is known to be July 2005.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _The location is Texas
column6: etc. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And such context information is what we hope to model as well.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So we're not going to just model the text.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And so one idea here is to model the variations of top content and

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: various content.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And this gives us different views of the water distributions.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Now on the bottom you will see the theme coverage of top Coverage might also vary

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: according to these context because in the case

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _of a location like Texas
column6: people might want to cover the red topics more. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: That's New Orleans.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: That's visualized here.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _But in a certain time period

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: maybe Particular topic and will be covered more.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So this variation is also considered in CPLSA.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _So to generate the searcher document With context
column6: with first also choose a view. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And this view of course now could be from any of these contexts.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Let's say
column6: we have taken this view that depends on the time. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: In the middle.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _So now
column6: we will have a specific version of word distributions. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Now
column6: you can see some probabilities of words for each topic. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Now
column6: once we have chosen a view

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: now the situation will be very similar to what happened in standard ((PRSA))

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _We assume we have got word distribution associated with each topic
column6: right? _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _And then next
column6: we will also choose a coverage from the bottom

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _we're going to choose a particular coverage
column6: and that coverage

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _before is fixed in PLSA
column6: and assigned to a particular document. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Each document has just one coverage distribution.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Now here
column6: because we consider context
column7: so the distribution of topics or the coverage _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: of Topics can vary depending on the context that has influenced the coverage.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _So
column6: for example
column7: we might pick a particular coverage. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Let's say in this case we picked a document specific coverage.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Now with the coverage and these word distributions

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: we can generate a document in exactly the same way as in PLSA.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _So what it means
column6: we're going to use the coverage to choose a topic

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: to choose one of these three topics.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Let's say we have picked the yellow topic.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Then we'll draw a word from this particular topic on the top.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Okay
column6: so we might get a word like government. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _And then next time we might choose a different topic
column6: and _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _we'll get donate
column6: etc. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Until we generate all the words.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And this is basically the same process as in PLSA.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So the main difference is when we obtain the coverage.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _And the word distribution
column6: we let the context influence our choice So _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: in other words we have extra switches that are tied to these contacts that will

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: control the choices of different views of topics and the choices of coverage.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And naturally the model we have more parameters to estimate.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _But once we can estimate those parameters that involve the context

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _then we will be able to understand the context specific views of topics

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: or context specific coverages of topics.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And this is precisely what we want in contextual text mining.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So here are some simple results.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: From using such a model.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Not necessary exactly the same model
column6: but similar models. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So on this slide you see some sample results of

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: comparing news articles about Iraq War and Afghanistan War.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Now we have about 30 articles on Iraq wa
column6: r and 26 articles on Afghanistan war. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _And in this case
column6: the goal is to review the common topic. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: It's covered in both sets of articles and

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: the differences of variations of the topic in each of the two collections.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So in this case the context is explicitly specified by the topic or collection.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And we see the results here show that there is a common

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: theme that's corresponding to Cluster 1 here in this column.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And there is a common theme indicting that United Nations is involved in both Wars.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: It's a common topic covered in both sets of articles.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _And that's indicated by the high probability words shown here
column6: united and _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: nations.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Now if you know the background
column6: of course this is not surprising and _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: this topic is indeed very relevant to both wars.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: If you look at the column further and then what's interesting's that the next

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: two cells of word distributions actually tell us

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: collection specific variations of the topic of United Nations.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _So it indicates that the Iraq War

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _United Nations was more involved in weapons factions
column6: whereas in _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: the Afghanistan War it was more involved in maybe aid to Northern Alliance.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: It's a different variation of the topic of United Nations.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So this shows that by bringing the context.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: In this case different the walls or different the collection of texts.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _We can have topical variations tied to these contexts

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: to review the differences of coverage of the United Nations in the two wars.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Now similarly if you look at the second cluster Class two

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _it has to do with the killing of people
column6: and

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: it's not surprising if you know the background about wars.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _All the wars involve killing of people
column6: but _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: imagine if you are not familiar with the text collections.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _We have a lot of text articles
column6: and _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: such a technique can reveal the common topics covered in both sets of articles.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: It can be used to review common topics in multiple sets of articles as well.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _If you look at of course in that column of cluster two

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: you see variations of killing of people and that corresponds to different contexts

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And here is another example of results

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: obtained from blog articles about Hurricane Katrina.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _In this case
column6: what you see here is visualization of _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: the trends of topics over time.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And the top one shows just the temporal trends of two topics.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _One is oil price
column6: and one is about the flooding of the city of New Orleans. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Now these topics are obtained from blog articles about Hurricane Katrina.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And people talk about these topics.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And end up teaching to some other topics.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _But the visualisation shows that with this technique

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: we can have conditional distribution of time.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Given a topic.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So this allows us to plot this conditional probability

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: the curve is like what you're seeing here.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _We see that
column6: initially
column7: the two curves tracked each other very well. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: But later we see the topic of New Orleans was mentioned again but oil price was not.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And this turns out to be

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _the time period when another hurricane
column6: hurricane Rita hit the region. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And that apparently triggered more discussion about the flooding of the city.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: The bottom curve shows the coverage of this topic

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: about flooding of the city by block articles in different locations.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And it also shows some shift of coverage that might be related to

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: people's migrating from the state of Louisiana to Texas for example.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So in this case we can see the time can be used as context to review trends of

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: topics.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: These are some additional results on spacial patterns.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: In this case it was about the topic of government response.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And there was some criticism about the slow response of government

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: in the case of Hurricane Katrina.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And the discussion now is covered in different locations.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And these visualizations show the coverage in different weeks of the event.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _And initially it's covered mostly in the victim states

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _in the South
column6: but then gradually spread into other locations. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _But in week four
column6: which is shown on the bottom left

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: we see a pattern that's very similar to the first week on the top left.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And that's when again Hurricane Rita hit in the region.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So such a technique would allow us to use location as context

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: to examine their issues of topics.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And of course the moral is completely general so

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: you can apply this to any other connections of text.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: To review spatial temporal patterns.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _His view found another application of this kind of model

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: where we look at the use of the model for event impact analysis.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So here we're looking at the research articles information retrieval.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _IR
column6: particularly SIGIR papers. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And the topic we are focusing on is about the retrieval models.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And you can see the top words with high probability about this model on the left.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And then we hope to examine the impact of two events.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _One is a start of TREC
column6: for Text and Retrieval Conference. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: This is a major evaluation sponsored by U.S.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _government
column6: and was launched in 1992 or around that time. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And that is known to have made a impact on

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: the topics of research information retrieval.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _The other is the publication of a seminal paper
column6: by Croft and Porte. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: This is about a language model approach to information retrieval.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: It's also known to have made a high impact on information retrieval research.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So we hope to use this kind of model to understand impact.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: The idea here is simply to use the time as context.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And use these events to divide the time periods into a period before.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: For the event and another after this event.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And then we can compare the differences of the topics.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _The and the variations
column6: etc. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _So in this case
column6: the results show before track the study of _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _retrieval models was mostly a vector space model
column6: Boolean model etc. _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _But the after Trec

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: apparently the study of retrieval models have involved a lot of other words.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _That seems to suggest some different retrieval tasks
column6: so for _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _example
column6: email was used in the enterprise search tasks and _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: subtopical retrieval was another task later introduced by Trec.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _On the bottom
column6: we see the variations that are correlated _

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: with the propagation of the language model paper.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _Before
column6: we have those classic probability risk model

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _logic model
column6: Boolean etc.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: we see clear dominance of language model as probabilistic models.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: _And we see words like language model
column6: estimation of parameters

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: So this technique here can use events as context to understand the impact of event.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Again the technique is generals so

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: you can use this to analyze the impact of any event.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Here are some suggested readings.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: The first is paper about simple staging of psi to label cross-collection comparison.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: It's to perform comparative text mining to allow us to

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: extract common topics shared by multiple collections.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: And there are variations in each collection.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: The second one is the main paper about the CPLSA model.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: Was a discussion of a lot of applications.

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: The third one has a lot of details about the special temporal patterns for

name: 5 - 8 - 4.8 Contextual Text Mining- Contextual Probabilistic Latent Semantic Analysis (00-17-59).srt
text: the Hurricane Katrina example.
